tools.name: search-hotels-by-name
tools.description: Search for hotels based on name.
tools.statement: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%');

tools.name: search-hotels-by-location
tools.description: Search for hotels based on location.
tools.statement: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE location LIKE CONCAT('%', ?, '%');

tools.name: book-hotel
tools.description: Book a hotel by its ID. Returns a message indicating whether the hotel was successfully booked or not.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the hotel to book.

tools.statement: UPDATE hotels SET booked = 1 WHERE id = ?;

tools.name: update-hotel
tools.description: Update a hotel's check-in and check-out dates by its ID. Returns a message indicating whether the hotel was successfully updated or not.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the hotel to update.

parameters.name: checkin_date
parameters.description: The new check-in date of the hotel (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: checkout_date
parameters.description: The new check-out date of the hotel (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

tools.statement: UPDATE hotels SET checkin_date = STR_TO_DATE(?, '%Y-%m-%d'), checkout_date = STR_TO_DATE(?, '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE id = ?;

tools.name: cancel-hotel
tools.description: Cancel a hotel by its ID.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the hotel to cancel.

tools.statement: UPDATE hotels SET booked = 0 WHERE id = ?;
